# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| main    | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in Cortex, please report it responsibly.

**Do NOT open a public issue.**

Instead, please email: security@dbhq.uk

You should receive an acknowledgement within 48 hours. We will work with you to understand the issue and develop a fix before any public disclosure.

## Disclosure Policy

- We will acknowledge receipt of your report promptly
- We will confirm the vulnerability and determine its impact
- We will release a fix as soon as practical
- We will credit you in the security advisory (unless you prefer otherwise)
